TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Annotation extends System.Object implements class System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable
Public NotInheritable Class Annotation Implements IXmlSerializable

summary.span: 表示 Microsoft Annotations Framework 中的用户批注。

span.span: Represents a user annotation in the Microsoft Annotations Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示一个批注，其中包含所有关联的定位和内容数据。 represents a single annotation with all associated anchoring and content data. 批注包含以下主要元素。An annotation consists of the following main elements. - 零个、一个或多个 标识要批注的内容。Zero, one, or more that identify what is being annotated. - 零个、一个或多个 包含批注的用户数据的。Zero, one, or more that contain the user data for the annotation. - 零个、一个或多个 定义批注创建者的。Zero, one, or more that define who created the annotation. - 一个 ，它指定创建批注的日期和时间。A that specifies the date and time when the annotation was created. - 指定上次更新批注的时间的。A that specifies when the annotation was last updated. - 唯一的批注 (全局唯一标识符 (GUID) # A3。A unique annotation (a globally unique identifier (GUID)).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 此构造函数支持 Windows Presentation Foundation 基础结构，且不应在代码中直接使用。

span.span: This constructor supports the Windows Presentation Foundation infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 应用程序不应使用无参数的无参数构造函数-无参数构造函数不会完全初始化实例。Applications should not use the parameterless constructor without parameters-the parameterless constructor does not fully initialize the instance. 若要创建新 应用程序，应使用基于参数的构造函数之一。To create a new applications should use one of the parameter-based constructors.

summary.span: 此构造函数支持 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 基础结构，且不应在代码中直接使用。

span.span: This constructor supports the Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数由 WPF 序列化基础结构使用，不应在一般情况下直接使用。This constructor is used by the WPF serialization infrastructure and should not be used directly under ordinary circumstances.

summary.span: 在批注 的列表中添加、移除或修改定位点时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an anchor is added, removed, or modified in the list of annotation .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了添加或删除定位点时，还 会在对定位点细则的任何修改时发生，例如对的更改 。In addition to when an anchor is added or removed, occurs on any modifications to an anchor subpart, such as a change to a .

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取零个或多个可定义所批注的数据选择的 定位点元素的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of zero or more anchor elements that define the data selection(s) being annotated.

value.span: 零个或多个 定位点元素的集合。

span.span: A collection of zero or more anchor elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的每个都 标识批注绑定到的数据选择 (换言之，"要批注的数据选择" ) 。Each in the collection identifies a data selection to which the annotation is bound (in other words, "the data selection that is being annotated"). 尽管大多数批注都指单个数据选择，只包含一个定位点 ，但如果单个批注引用多个数据选择，则可能会出现多个定位点。While most annotations refer to a single data selection and contain just one anchor , multiple anchors can occur if a single annotation refers to multiple data selections. 返回的 集合不能为 null; 但是，集合可能包含零个元素。The returned collection is never null; however, the collection may contain zero elements.

span.span: Gets the of the annotation type.

value.span: 此类批注的 XML 限定名。

span.span: The XML qualified name for this kind of annotation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的批注类型是 作为参数传递给构造函数的名称 。The returned annotation type is the name passed as a parameter to the constructor. > [!NOTE] > `null`如果通过使用不带参数的无参数构造函数正确构造批注，则返回。 returns `null` if the annotation was incorrectly constructed by using a parameterless constructor without parameters. (不带参数的无参数构造函数，则不会完全初始化实例，只能与 XML 序列化一起使用。 ) 若要创建新批注，应用程序应使用 采用 作为参数的构造函数。(The parameterless constructor without parameters does not fully initialize the instance and is used only internally in combination with XML serialization.) To create a new annotation, applications should use the constructor that takes an as a parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了添加或删除货物时，对 货物细则的任何修改都会发生，例如对 货物集合中的进行更改 。In addition to when a cargo is added or removed, occurs on any modification to a cargo subpart, such as a change to an in the collection of a cargo.

span.span: A collection of zero or more cargo elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的每个都 包含批注的用户定义数据。Each in the collection contains user-defined data for the annotation. 返回的 集合始终为 null; 但是，如果没有用于批注的用户数据，则集合可能包含零个元素。The returned collection is never null; however, the collection may contain zero elements if there is no user data for the annotation.
